name: @dcoupld/oas-generic-adapter
description: The OAS DbC Generic Adapter Package

scripts.development:serve: nodemon --watch ./src --ext ts,json --exec "npm run check-types && dotenvx run -- tsx ./src/index.ts" --errors=true
scripts.test:foundation: npm run check-types && cross-env NODE_ENV=test vitest run --config tests/foundation/.ancillary/config/vitest.config.ts
scripts.package:build: npm run test:foundation && rimraf ./.delivery/.builds/dist && tsc -p ./.delivery/configuration/tsconfig.json && cpy ./package.json ./.delivery/.builds/dist

author: valentineshi.dev@gmail.com
